ygData.messageBody:
Go for Gold then:

Legba O'Golde




Papa Legba <legba@...> on 23/03/2000 14:38:37

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards Role (was CHains)




From: Papa Legba <legba@...>

I was thinking leaving green for a druid (in hopes we get one).
Right now the colors taken are yellow (the bard, don't ask...)
and red (wizard), a cnecro who may join us has requested black.
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
